channel.title: Runnable jar file for the client
channel.description:
sup guys im in need of some help here.
I'm wondering if someone can tell me what I need to do to make one.
I don't need to be told specifically, but I need direction on what I need to do.
I got eclipse and I understand how to make a single class file into a runnable jar. Im trying to figure out what exactly do i need to do in eclipse to get a project into a runnable jar.
thanks.
EDIT: do I just need to get all the classes in a single folder and then make a jar file....

item.title: Runnable jar file for the client
item.dc:creator: @stEps stEps
item.description:
@stEps wrote:

NoLives:

Far as I know, that won’t stop people, if that’s what you’re trying to do.

stop people from what? that doesn’t make sense to me. I’m trying to make a executable jar file with multiple classes.

Read full topic
item.source: Runnable jar file for the client
